text_block_list.text: It was a few days after the Selection Race, in which Agnes Tachyon ultimately did not participate.
I caught sight of her in the hall and, fearing I might be dragged off to her laboratory for some hideous experiment, tried to sneak past unnoticed when—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: So… you've decided? To leave…
"To leave"… Wait, she doesn't mean "drop out", does she? I stopped for a moment and listened intently.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: That's about the size of it. Apparently telling me to run in that race was intended as some sort of ultimatum.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Why not… just run… Or, maybe… show up for class a little more often…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I don't appreciate my research being interrupted time and again. And I believe I was in class as much as time allowed, was I not?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… if you drop out, you'll never run in the Twinkle Series… What about your research…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: It will continue, naturally. I still have this brain, and this body…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Besides, races that attract highly skilled horsegirls do exist beyond the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I could even take my activities abroad! England, France, America, Dubai — boundless possibilities surely await!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Abroad… that's a… bold proposition…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! All in the name of science!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In any case, I, Agnes Tachyon, will continue to use this body to search for the outer limits of speed. That much will never change.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: … I… see

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? Hmm hmm?! Could it be that you were worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Or perhaps after all of our experiments together you've formed a habit!? You needn't worry, I'd be more than happy to send you your dose!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No… if it means escaping your crazy experiments, you can go… wherever you like…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But… if you can continue your research, then… that's good. …Goodbye then.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Aah, wait, Cafe! There's just one last test I wanted to… she's not listening, is she.
choice_data_list: Are you really going to drop out…?
Are you really going to drop out…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well, well, rookie. Our paths seem to cross a lot of late.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But, well, the answer is yes. My potential was enough to get me in, and they have been very patient regarding my activities… but it seems that patience has finally run out.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The Japan Horsegirl Training Center Academy is the premier training institute for horsegirls, and famous for valuing student independence.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But one thing is not negotiable — you find a trainer and you make your debut in professional racing. And if you won't do that, then the academy has no need of you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And, well, what with skipping classes and refusing to find a trainer because it might interfere with my research… that counts me out.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So here we are. I've received the recommendation to withdraw.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Admittedly, being unable to race in the Twinkle Series could be a setback to my research.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But… it's preferable to letting all the other distractions keep me from doing any research at all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I suppose it was inevitable that this was going to happen. In fact, perhaps I've been awaiting the day. So it's a—

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: "Actually a good thing"? Come now, there's no need to put it like that.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Well well! The student council president makes an appearance! To what do we owe the honor?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pardon the interruption. I need to borrow her for a moment. Agnes Tachyon, is your mind made up about leaving?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: As always, my mind is on whatever is best for my research, Ms. President. Any further questions?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: … No, no more questions. Instead I have a request.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: A request, you say? Hmm, what might that be?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Run with me, Agnes Tachyon.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh, and look who it is. Just here to watch the sunset I presume? You're pretty bold, rookie.
I couldn't pass up the chance to watch her, so regarded for her pure running ability, race against "The Emperor" Symboli Rudolph herself…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmm. Fair enough. I can respect a man who follows his curiosity. Watch away.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I imagine it's likely the last time you'll see me running this course anyway.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Sorry to keep you waiting, Agnes Tachyon. Fortunately we have the course all to ourselves… and our only spectator is this rookie trainer. Looks like we can enjoy a quiet bout.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Isn't that why you chose this time of day? Though I know not what you're hoping to get out of this.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh… Now then, does 2000m on the turf course sound good to you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Whatever you want. I'm sure I owe you a great deal, so it's the least I can do.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …I don't think you owe me anything. After all, I couldn't help you in the end.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! Always so serious!! No matter. 2000m on turf it is. Let us prepare.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: She needs to compete in the Twinkle Series for her research, and that's why she joined the academy. But if being a student here interferes with that research, she has no choice but to leave.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: She's not wedded to the Twinkle Series per se, so she chooses to go and find that level of competition elsewhere.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It all sounds so logical… but don't you think there's one thing that's not quite right?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Why did she stay at the academy this long in the first place?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Why stay here, where she can't get around the trainers — or "hindrances", as she calls them?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: … What do you think?
And so, with no one to see it but me, Agnes Tachyon and Symboli Rudolph lined up to race…!
